channel.title: pytest - Today I Learnt...
channel.description: Recent content in pytest on Today I Learnt...

item.title: You can stack `pytest`'s `parametrize` decorators
item.description: As in: import pytest @pytest.mark.parametrize("x", [1,2,3]) @pytest.mark.parametrize("y", [4,5,6]) def test_cartesian_product(x, y): pass which will run the test for all combinations of the two input lists:
